title: Gamification-Based Course for Strengthening Social Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social issues and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, domain expertise: intermediate, assessment method: summative assessment-focused.

learning_goals: Applying gamification design principles, learners can develop at least one social issue simulation game.
In game-based learning environments, learners demonstrate collaboration and decision-making competencies with over 80% engagement.
Learners can analyze gamification elements (e.g., points, badges, leaderboards) and explain their effects on motivating learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
